alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:05PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER... NORTHWESTERN FALL RIVER AND SOUTHEASTERN WESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM MDT... At 1105 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Argyle to 4 miles north of Dewey to 3 miles southeast of Morrisey. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dewey around 1110 PM MDT. Argyle around 1120 PM MDT. Burdock around 1125 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
